title: Asian Stocks Rise, Gold Gains on Weaker Dollar: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities followed Wall Street higher on Friday after upbeat US economic data and easing geopolitical tensions buoyed investor sentiment.
content: Asian equities followed Wall Street higher on Friday after upbeat US economic data and easing geopolitical tensions buoyed investor sentiment.
